samples.text_description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the authentication module that allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted request.
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the user input validation allows attackers to inject malicious scripts.
SQL injection vulnerability in the database query function allows unauthorized access to sensitive data.
Improper access control in the API endpoint allows unauthenticated users to access restricted resources.
Information disclosure vulnerability in error messages reveals sensitive system information to attackers.
